### Request for Proposal: Valves

#### Contracting Entity
The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of valves.

#### Solicitation Details
- **Solicitation Number**: W8482-241578/A
- **Publication Date**: May 17, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 16, 2023 (14:00:00)

#### Goods and Services Required
The DND requires the delivery of 20 Gate Valves and 30 Gate Valves at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia, respectively.

- **Valve Details**: 
  - **Part Number**: C-02GT-6E15-GMT
  - **Manufacturer**: Montreal Bronze Ltd (NCAGE: 38881)
  - **Quantity**: 20 (CFB Halifax) and 30 (CFB Esquimalt)
  - **Unit of Issue**: Each (EA)

#### Evaluation Criteria
Bidders will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest price. Equivalent or substitute products must be indicated with the brand name and model, or Part Number, and NCAGE.

#### Language and Currency
Documents may be submitted in either French or English. Bids must be priced in Canadian dollars; foreign currency bids will not be accepted.

#### Preference
The Crown has a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.

#### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Anthony Lemoine-Hoefsmit
Department of National Defence
Phone: (819) 939-3725
Email: anthony.lemoine-hoefsmit@forces.gc.ca

#### Available Documents
The RFQ document, including all clauses and appendices, is available for download from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5585/w8482-241578a---english-rfp-clauses.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5585/w8482-241578a---english-rfp-clauses.pdf) (English) or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5585/w8482-241578a---french-rfp-clauses.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5585/w8482-241578a
